document_name: The PIMS  3697: Strengthening Protected Area Network of Turkey: Catalyzing Sustainability of Marine and Coastal Protected Areas

outputs.output_descr: To facilitate expansion of the national system of marine and coastal protected areas and improve its management effectiveness. The proposed long-term solution for marine biodiversity conservation in Turkey's territorial sea is a reconfigured MCPA network designed to protect biodiversity while optimizing its ecological service functions  under effective and sustainable adaptive management.

project_descr:
PIMS 3697: Strengthening Protected Area Network of Turkey: 
Catalyzing Sustainability of Marine and Coastal Protected Areas
